channel.title: I hate my math teacher
channel.description:
my retarded math teacher gave me this shittish homework im not smart enough to do... I was like for god sakes im in 6th grade how the hell do i do this. well anyways here are the questions and i dont get a shit about them.
1.Some lady has many pens in her desk she says if you divide the total number of pens by 2/3/4/5/6 you get a remainder of 1. what is the smallest number of pens that could be in her desk.
2. Clue one: the greatest common factor of the mystery number is 7. clue two: the least common multiple of the mystery pair is 70. clue three: both numbers in the pair have two digits clue four: one of the numbers is odd and the other is evan.
any help????

item.title: I hate my math teacher
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

The answer to 1 is easy, 6 * 5 * 4 * 3 * 2.

Read full topic
